body.p: If the quote/epigraph is written in verses, it is also tagged as <lg>:
body.codeblock: <epigraph> <!-- sofern vorhanden --> <cit> <quote> <lg> <head>[title]</head> <!-- where applicable --> <l>[verse]</l> <l>[verse]</l> </lg> </quote> <bibl>[author of the poem]</bibl> <!-- where applicable --> </cit> </epigraph>

example.title: Encoding of Quotations in Verse Form

fig.codeblock: <epigraph> <cit rendition="#et"> <quote> <lg> <l>Hier quillt die träumeriſche,</l><lb/> <l>Urjugendliche Friſche;</l><lb/> <l>In ahnungsvoller Hülle</l><lb/> <l>Die ganze Lebensfülle.</l> </lg> </quote> <bibl><hi rendition="#g">Lenau</hi></bibl>. </cit> </epigraph><lb/>

p.i: Source: Roßmäßler, Emil Adolf: Der Wald. Leipzig u. a., 1863. [Facsimile 33]
